description:
For a more comfortable and safer ride in icy conditions, these ultimate commuter tires keep you going in even the most challenging winter conditions. The Gravdal tires feature 252 carefully positioned studs to provide unmatched traction at lower pressure, and keep the rolling resistance low.

  • 5mm reflective strip along the sidewall keeps you visible at night
  • Studs feature a dome-shaped carbide tip with a steel base for durability
  • Siping on larger tread lugs increases the acceleration, braking and cornering traction
name: 45NRTH Gravdal Studded Commuter 700 x 38c Wire Tire
